name: Exodae (Canceled)
blurb: An amped sci-fi platforming adventure sure to cater to the Metroid/Mega-man fan in everyone. Except this time, with friends!

rewards.reward: No Reward

[Rank: Recruit]
A penny for your thoughts is nothing to scoff at, and in this case a dollar goes further. We sincerely thank you for having us in your thoughts.

[Rewards]
You'll be Included in the Hall of Recognition list in game as well as given a vote towards Game Development Polls
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Special: Early Bird]
Eager to get in the action eh? We like your style.

[Rewards]
All Petty Officer 3rd Class Rewards
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Rank: Petty Officer 3rd Class]
Welcome aboard marine! We can use every able bodied man we can get.

[Rewards]
Recruit Rank Rewards as well as a Digital Download of Exodae on Release
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Rank: Petty Officer 2nd Class]
Your willing to go the extra mile eh? Good to hear soldier!

[Rewards]
Petty Officer 3rd Class Rewards as you'll also be Enrolled in the Alpha/Beta Testers Listing
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Rank: Petty Officer 1st Class]
Your outstanding performance has lead us to believe your ready to be in charge of a few others, but just a few. 

[Rewards]
Petty Officer 2nd Class Rewards as well as 2 Additional Copies of the Game to Enjoy with your Comrades.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Rank: Chief Petty Officer]
They grow up so fast....
Your well on your way to being a great squad leader.

[Rewards]
Petty Officer 2nd Class Rewards as well as 3 Additional Copies of the Game to Enjoy with your Comrades. You'll also be given Digital Download of Exodae's Soundtrack to enjoy while you fight together.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)

[Rank: Ensign]
You've made it this far because your a thinker, and we need thinkers soldier.

[Rewards]
Chief Petty Officer Rewards as well User Access to the Community Development Forums.
And you can visit our forums wearing your new Exodae Ranking Officer T-Shirt.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Rank: Lieutenant]
You never cease to amaze soldier. Very few tend to always want to strive for better.

[Rewards]
Ensign Rewards and an Exodae Promotional Poster Print to decorate your Barrack walls.
You also get an Increased Set of Development Forum Priviledges
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: The People's Hero]
The people look up to you for you great deeds soldier. Your name will be sung in legends.
[Rewards]
Lieutenant Rewards and you'll also be able to name a non-player character in the campaign.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Rank: Lieutenant Commander]
Your achievements are becoming a thing of legend soldier. Keep it up.
[Rewards]
Lieutenant Rewards as well as a Copy of The Development Documentary including hidden footage not included in our public version.
You'll also be able to choose from two exclusive T-Shirts for this tier.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Lieutenant Commander Explorer] Your achievements are becoming a thing of legend soldier. Keep it up. [Rewards] Lieutenant Commander Rewards and if the 400K Goal is met, you may design a section of the in-game map with the developers. (Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons) (Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: War Enthusiast]
Its people like you that keep our fine military establishment running.
[Rewards]
Lieutenant Commander Rewards as well as 1 of 16 exclusive rendered paintings from a scene in Exodae of your choosing. 
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Rank: Captain]
There are few as well prepared as you are for this fight sir. Godspeed.
[Rewards]
Lieutenant Commander Rewards as well as set of Exodae Lore Content including a Lorebook, World Map and Players Guide.
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Captain+] There are few as well prepared as you are for this fight sir. Godspeed. [Rewards] Lieutenant Commander Rewards as well as set of Exodae Lore Content including a Lorebook, World Map and Players Guide. \r\n+ If 200K Stretch Goal is reached, an In-Game Shrine will be created with your input. (Normal Captain Tier Rewards will apply if goal is not met)(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons) (Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Vice Admiral]
Every good leader needs the few ready to go behind them. You have our extreme gratitude.
[Rewards]
Fleet Admiral Rewards
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Rank: Fleet Admiral]
I bow my head to you good sir. The entire human race... no the galaxy is indebted to you for your heroic actions.
[Rewards]
All Previous Rewards as well as Studio Tour of our workplace in Las Vegas followed by dinner and a night or two on the town if you want. 
(Backers must be able to travel to Las Vegas, NV)
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Fleet Admiral+] I bow my head to you good sir. The entire human race... no the galaxy is indebted to you for your heroic actions. [Rewards] \r\nFleet Admiral Rewards and \r\nIf the 500K Goal is met, a physical replica of a Marine Arm Cannon, Lights and all will be created  for you. (Backers must be able to travel to Las Vegas, NV) (Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons) (Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Fleet Admiral of Weapons] I bow my head to you good sir. The entire human race... no the galaxy is indebted to you for your heroic actions. [Rewards] Fleet Admiral Rewards and if the 400K Stretch Goal is Met, you may create a type of sidearm to be used in the game with the developers.(Backers must be able to travel to Las Vegas, NV) (Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons) (Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)

[Special: Reveled Legend]
I never thought I'd have the honor to even be in your presence, champion.
[Rewards]
2 Days with us in our Studio as we work with you to develop a character based completely off of you to be put into the major storyline as aMarine Commander. You'll do the voice, motion designs , and and be the model as well.
Along with all other rewards as well.
(You must be able to travel to Las Vegas, NV)
(Refer To Stretch Goal Chart For Future Add-ons)
(Refer To Community Development Section for more info on how you can help sculpt YOUR game)
